fields.name: Mathematical and Computing Lab
fields.description: The departmentof Mathematics is one of the pioneering and the most distinguished departments in National Institute of Technology, Trichy. Applying a multi-disciplinary research and teaching methods, the Department strongly believes in finding mathematical solutions for various social-economic, technological and work related processes and challenges. With fourteen  faculty members representing major areas of mathematics, the Department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research as well as teaching and innovation. In addition to a number of world-class publications and reference sources, our faculty interact and collaborate with leading mathematicians around the world and regularly organize international conference/workshops and outreach events.,,The Department is committed to outstanding graduate training to produce leading scholars in various fields of mathematics. Since its inception, the Department  molds Ph. D graduates to carry out challenging research problems which have wide ranging industrial and social implications. Students are provided with ample opportunities to improve their research, teach courses, and participate in conferences/seminars. Besides emphasizing quality research, the Department also encourages its students’ to participate in extracurricular and other related activities in their areas of interest. From 2019, the Department offers M. Sc. in Mathematics.

The language lab consists of 30 student booths and a control unit for the teacher.Literally, a teacher can teach the four basic language skills through this lab ,which is based on a state of the art technology. The teaching material can be sent to all the student ,stations and the teacher can speak, discuss, clarify ,and so on from the place where he is sitting,(Teacher's station).The lab also aims to facilitate self-learning.

fields.description: EMCO PC TURN 55-2NOS, EMCO PC MILL 55-2NOS, TRIAC-3-AXIS MILLING MACHINE: RHINO X-3 ROBOTWOKCELL, AGV TRAINING SYSTEM. APPLICATIONS:All the above facilities are used by our Production Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and P.G students. Also it is being used in CNC training for other Engineering College Students and practicing Engineers. It is also used for setting up the proposed Nodal CNC center to facilitate CNC Training.

fields.name: Advanced CNC
fields.description: HMT STC-15 Turning Centre, HARDFORD VMC, LEADWELL CNC TURNING CENTER, APPLICATIONS. All the above facilities are used by our Production Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and P.G. Students. Also it is being used in CAD training for other Engineering College Students and Practicing Engineers.

fields.name: Simulation
fields.description: 1. General Purpose Simulation Software (Student Version), 2. Arena (Student Version), 3. OM Expert, 4. SIMPROCESS (Student Version), 5. Virtual NC, 6. QUEST, 7.OPTQUEST, 8. CAFIMS, 9. UGRIP. Faculties: Dr Kumanan Somasundaram

fields.name: Operations Management
fields.description: Operations Management Software are interactive, user-friendly and are widely used as operations  management models or tools. The following models are built and practiced in the OM laboratory. Facility Layout: Relative Allocation, Line Balancing. Forecasting: Moving Average, Weighted Moving Average, Exponential Smoothing,Exponential Smoothing With Linear Trend, Linear Regression Analysis. Inventory Control: Economic Order Quantity, Economic Lot Size, EOQ with Service Level , Fixed Time Period with Usage ,EOQ with Discount Job Shop Scheduling: One Machine Scheduling ,Two Machine Scheduling, Multiple Machine Scheduling. Linear Programming, Material Requirements Planning (MRP), Production Planning: Linear Decision Rule,Chase Strategy Method ,Level Strategy Method

fields.name: Computer Integrated Manufacturing
fields.description: In the competitive manufacturing industry environment, it is now essential to employ computer aided product development and manufacturing methods. Aiming at this, the Department regularly conducts training courses on Programming and operation of CNC machines and CAD/CAM software. For the past ten years, the Department has conducted nearly 40 such courses and generated about of Rs. 20 lakhs.

fields.name: Robotics
fields.description: Equipments :Scorbot-Robot, Scorbot ER5 Plus, View Flex Machine System, Compact Colour Vision System

fields.name: Software
fields.description: There is centralized computer center available in the college, where about 300 nodes with latest software like: Pro-Engineer 2000i, Unigraphics 15.0, IDEAS master series 5.0, AutoCAD 2002, Autocad 2000, AutoCAD R14, MATLAB 6, which is useful for Production Engineering specialization and SPDD, LINDO, LINGO, ARENA, PROMODEL, GPSS which are useful for Industrial Engineering specialization is added advantages for the students of Production Engineering Department.

fields.name: Powder Metallugy,
fields.description: Tools available Atomic Absorption Spectrometer, 100T Friction Screw press, Atmosphere Controlled High Temperature Furnaces, Centrifugal Ball Mill, Four Point Planetary Ball Mill, High Energy Ball Mills, Laser Particle analyser, Glove Box

fields.name: Metallography
fields.description: Scanning Electron Microscope, High Resolution Optical Microscope with Photographic Attachment, Image Analyzer, Abrasive Cut-off wheels, Sample Mounting Unit Stereo Microscope

fields.name: Mechanical Testing
fields.description: Universal Testing Machine (60 T & 100T), Haunsfield Tensometer (Digital and Manual), Rockwell Hardness Tester (Digital and Manual), Brinell Hardness Tester, Micro Hardness Tester, Impact Testing Machine, Rotary Fatigue Testing Machine, Creep Batch

fields.name: Welding
fields.description: SMAW/GTAW Power Source, GMAW welding Power Source, Automatic GTAW Facility, DATA Acquisition System

fields.name: Corrosion
fields.description: Salt Spray Unit, The other facilities in this Department include: PARC Scanning Potentiostat, Potentiostat/Galvanostat, Computer Controlled Potentiostat/Galvanostat, Vacuum Impregnation Unit, Stress Corrosion Testing Unit, Facility for Electro Plating/ Electro Polishing, Facility for Conversion Coating/ Electroless Plating

fields.name: Process Modelling
fields.description: Viscometer, Thermocalc, Data acquisition system, System workstation

fields.name: Surface Engineering
fields.description: Abrasion Wear Tester, High Temperature Wear Tester, Wear Testing Machine, Potentiostat/Galvanostat, Also Pulse Rectifier

fields.name: Control Systems Research Lab
fields.description: Research Area, Nonlinear controller design and it's applications to power electronics and robotic systems, Control strategy for electric/hybrid vehicle system with power electronic converter topologies for effective utilization of renewable energy, Design and implementation of fault tolerant control system, Adaptive Sliding Mode Control, Finite Time Controller Design for Single Machine Infinite Bus (SMIB) System, Semi-Autonomous Two Wheeler Mobile Robot.Fault tolerant control scheme for p.w.m. inverter fed induction motor based railway power system. MPPT control of surface permanent magnet synchronous machine based wind energy conversion system using sliding mode control. Research Project, Semi-Autonomous Two Wheeler Mobile Robot, Electric Vehicle, BLDC MOTOR

fields.name: Hybrid Electrical Systems Lab
fields.description: Faculties: Dr.N.Kumaresan, Dr.M.P.Selvan, Dr.S.Moorthi, Dr.P.Raja

fields.name: Networking Research Lab
fields.description: This lab is equipped with the following :(i) Three desktop systems with configuration of core i7 processors (3.40GHz), 4 GB RAM , all interconnected with each other with a high- speed Ethernet of 1 Gbps with Internet facility.(ii) Two 6 core High-end workstations with configuration of 2.3GHz, 15MB 7.2 GT/s, nVidia Quadro 4000 , 2GB with Dual DVI display.(iii) Universal trainer kits with ARM and PIC cards.(iv) 8051 starter kits, CC2500 Zigbee pairs, 2.4GHz Zigbee transceivers, Temperature sensors, humidity sensors, CO sensors and current sensors.(v) Planned to procure Motes, data Acquistion boards, Sensor boards and QualNet under plan fund.This lab is set up for research scholars (PhD and MS), to carry out research in areas like wireless technology , web services and networking. The different kinds of sensors are provided to develop mini and real-time wireless sensor projects by the students. Softwares like MPLAB, Keil etc. are used to program the universal trainer kits. QualNet will be used to simulate and study the performance of various wireless sensor network scenarios. Research will be carried out in the field of WSN. Contact Details:  sudha@nitt.edu. Faculties: Dr.S.Sudha

fields.name: Switched Mode Power Converters Research Laboratory
fields.description: This lab addresses issues related to energy conservation, alternate energy systems, zero energy buildings and locomotion. This lab also focusses on topics such as Electro-magnetics, switched mode power conversion, power quality, power converters, PWM techniques and AC motor drives. Experiments and projects in this lab includes multilevel inverter topologies, control for renewable power generation systems, modelling for the design of switched mode power controllers, hybrid energy technology, wind energy system for stand- alone, grid connected applications and simulation of high current converters for heating and welding applications.Faculties: Dr. S. Senthil Kumar
